member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Static class providing various extension methods for the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which generates an MD5 hash of a given string instance.
member.returns: Returns a string representation of the MD5 hash.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which converts the words "true", "ok", "yes", "1", "да" to a boolean value of true.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which attepmts to convert a string numeric value to a short value

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which attepmts to convert a string numeric value to an int value

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which attepmts to convert a string numeric value to a long value

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which attepmts to convert a string representing ad date to a DateTime value

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which capitalizes the first letter of a string
member.returns: Returns the same string with the first letter capitalized

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: String extension method which returns the substring between two given strings.
member.returns: Returns the substring between startString and endString. If the substrings are not cointained in the input string - returns an empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which converts every letter of a string in Cyrillic to its Latin representation.
member.returns: Returns a string with letters converted from Cyrillic to Latin.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which converts every letter of a string in Latin to its Cyrillic representation.
member.returns: Returns a string with letters converted from Latin to Cyrillic.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which converts Cyrillic to Latin letters of a username using method and replaces invalid symbols in the input string with an empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which replaces invalid symbols in the input string with an empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: String extension method which returns the first N characters of a string.
member.param: N, the number of characters to return
member.returns: Returns a string with lenght N

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which returns the file extension from a valid filename
member.returns: Returns the extension of the filename

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which returns the content type of a file determined by its extension.
member.returns: Returns the content type if known, "application/octet-stream" - otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: String extension method which converts the input string to a byte array.
member.returns: Returns a byte array of the input string
